entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the American border. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:26 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the American border in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 60 gusting to 80 early in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:26 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Local blowing snow. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 90. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:26 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
